resources.string: The Mobile Quick Quiz aoo is an android application that provides a new technique of taking quizzes using mobile phones. This application is developed for people who like to play challenging quizzes. The project provides an effective challenge to the player. The system has an admin login that has overall control over Question and Answer in the Server. Admin feeds the Question and Answer in to the System. The questions are randomly picked and sent on users android devices. . The user has to first create an account into the system for playing quiz. At the end of the Quiz the system checks all the answer and generates a brief report card .
